attributes.action: Reclaim our language back from the PC squad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England is our country, English is our language. Our nursery rhymes have been handed down from generation to generation and they have survived world wars too. Now we are told we can't sing baa baa black sheep, call a blackboard a blackboard but a chalk board, we have lost the golliwog that a lot of us grew up with, we are no longer black & blue when we have a bruise and to top it all.. now I hear that we can't order a black coffee now !!!!! When is this stupidity going to stop.
We need to claim back our English language, stop being soft and stand up for what is ours. 
We are far to soft and sensitive in this country for our own good..... It's time to toughen up before we lose everything that is English to us !!!!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
